ADS.Text_tips1: The Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective guide introduces you to the captivating mystery game.
Learn the intricate mechanics and controls of Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective.
Discover the intriguing storyline and unravel the secrets behind the supernatural phenomena.
Master the art of manipulating objects and interacting with the environment as a ghost.
Explore different locations and uncover clues to progress through the game.
Learn how to possess and manipulate the actions of living characters to alter the course of events.
Discover the unique abilities and powers you possess as a ghost in Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective.
Find out how to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles using your ghostly abilities.
Learn about the fascinating cast of characters and their roles in the story.
Discover the hidden connections and mysteries that intertwine the characters' fates.
Master the time manipulation feature to rewind and alter past events.
Learn how to strategically use your limited number of Ghost Tricks to progress in the game.
Discover the stunning visuals and atmospheric soundtrack that enhance the gameplay experience.
Find tips and hints for challenging puzzles and tricky situations in Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective.
Learn about the multiple endings and the impact of your choices on the storyline.
Explore the Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective guide to fully immerse yourself in this captivating detective adventure.
